example.eg: The young girl was simply dressed.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 简明地，明白地, 简单地，纯粹地，坦白地

example.eg: Of course I'm not annoyed with you; it's simply that I don't have time to go out with you tonight.
example.egtrans: 当然，我不生你的气，我只不过是今晚没时间陪你出去。

example.eg: Mark and Rachel had a simply amazing wedding.
example.egtrans: 马克和瑞秋的婚礼简直太棒了！

example.eg: If you lived simply you wouldn't have to work such long hours.
I live quite simply by American standards: no cell phone, no cable TV, and only one car.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 相当简朴, 相当简单

example.eg: She is quite simply the best figure skater in the world.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 坦率地说, 说实在话
